This document contains the API specification of the DRM (distributed resource machine), interface version 2.

See:
          Description

Packages
drm.agentbase The agent layer defines a very basic core functionality for handling mobile agents.
drm.agents Package containing agent implementations.
drm.core Package that implements the collective-based model of computation, and the DRM.
drm.server Package that implements user interfaces to the node.
drm.util Contains convinience classes that are independent from the rest of the packages.

 

This document contains the API specification of the DRM (distributed resource machine), interface version 2.

Additional Specification

  • Tools This page describes the tools that come with the DRM distribution.
  • Security models and their configuration This page describes how to set up the different security models when installing the node.
  • Starting experiments This page describes the technical aspects of starting an experiment on the DRM.
  • DRM Protocol This page specifies the lowest layer of the protocol of the DRM overlay network. It describes compatibility issues, the requirements of joining the network.
  • Configuration This page describes the configuration parameters, their meaning and the way to set them.
